channel.title: Meetings on Mark Needham
channel.description: Recent content in Meetings on Mark Needham

item.title: Meetings: Guerilla Collaboration
item.description: As I’ve mentioned on twitter a few times my current team has a lot of meetings and apart from using the passive aggressive approach that Toby Tripp’s meeting ticker provides I’ve also been flicking through Chapter 19, ‘Guerilla Collaboration’, of Jean Tabaka’s ‘Collaboration Explained: Facilitation skills for software project leaders’ which gives other ideas. I’ve also seen some useful ideas that my colleagues have used in meetings that I’ve been part of.
